content.raw:
I think we should list the sensor on `sdf/1.6/sensor.sdf`.

I also have a concern of whether using `<camera>` is enough, or if we want also to capture some configurations from `<ray>` / `<lidar>`. I know this sensor is based on `gazebo_ros_openni_kinect` which didn't have these extra configurations, but I'm not sure if it was this way because it was the only way it could be done on Gazebo-classic, or because that's the best approach.
